mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_forums WHERE forum_id = a.forum_id) as people, CASE WHEN (select user_id from user_forums where user_id = #{user_id} and forum_id = #{forum_id}) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS forum_following_state FROM forums a LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_section b ON a.forum_id = b.forum_id where a.forum_id = #{forum_id}
